snippet: Fans of the travel show host and writer Anthony Bourdain can now follow in his footsteps using a new application for iPad, iPhone and iTouch: The Travel Channel Layover Guide With Anthony Bourdain, being introduced this month.
abstract: Fans of the travel show host and writer Anthony Bourdain can now follow in his footsteps using a new application for iPad, iPhone and iTouch: The Travel Channel Layover Guide With Anthony Bourdain, being introduced this month.

headline.main: Followers of a TV Host Can Follow His Footsteps
